"Rediah": "Very well, I will now explain the \"Fashion Catalog\"."
"Have you ever looked at the outfit of another ARKS and thought to yourself \"That looks nice\"?"
"On those occasions, you can convey your thoughts to them by giving them a \"Like\"."
"People really appreciate this kind of gesture, so don't be afraid to give out a \"Like\" whenever the mood strikes you."
"Also, if you really like a certain outfit, you can register it as a \"Bookmark\"."
"You can browse your registered Fashion Bookmarks from the \"Edit Fashion\" section of the \"Equipment/Palette\" menu."
"With that, now I'd like you to try giving a \"Like\" to someone else's Fashion."
